description: This file provides configuration utilities for a FastAPI backend, including environment variable loading, parsing, and application settings retrieval.

methods.name: str get_env(name: str, default: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Retrieves an environment variable, raising an error if required and not set.

methods.name: List[str] _parse_origins(origins_csv: str)
methods.description: Converts a comma-separated string of origins into a list of stripped strings.

methods.name: dict get_settings()
methods.description: Loads application configuration settings from environment variables, applying defaults and parsing as needed.

ctags.name: get_env
ctags.pattern: /^def get_env(name: str, default: Optional[str] = None) -> str:$/
